(My apologies, forgot to post for Unitron in my last post)

Unitron:


Unitron entered the Ark.  Going thorugh corridors, he entered the bridge.  He 
could see a lot of scorch marks (from Smokescreen and Set's fight).  Walking 
over to a control pad, he powered down the autoguns and unlocked the doors, 
opening them wide.  Taking out a laser pistol, he fired three bolts into the 
controls.  Running to the door, he took out two grenades, set to explode on 
impact.  Tossing them at the controls he ran, the door shutting, Unitron 
headed for the outside, hearing a boom and a screach as the door he had been 
near began to give from the explosions.
